data.text:
@OttawaHealth @maddyeisenberg They don’t need the shot. It’s risks far out way any benefit! UK advisory board said so!  Gov ignored their advice making it a political decision not a medical one!!! 
Risks are way too high!
@OttawaHealth @JimWatsonOttawa Wow, great news haha. Nobody should be getting their kids vaccinated at this point, it’s almost unbelievable.
@OttawaHealth How many kids have died from this.  Why isn't the media reporting on vaccine injury.  They NEVER have.  It's impossible that there has been 0 injury and 0 death.
